item.description:
No maybes.

Time has been set. 6:45pm showing on Saturday. Look to see you there!

Summary from Rotten Tomatoes.
Ray Winstone, Ian McShane, John Hurt, Tom Wilkinson, Stephen Dillane, Joanne Whalley and Melvil Poupaud star in 44 Inch Chest, a provocative new film that is outrageously profane and surprisingly tender amidst an explosion of unbridled testosterone. Written by the Sexy Beast screenwriting team of Louis Mellis & David Scinto and directed by Malcolm Venville, who is currently in production in New York on his second feature film, Henry’s Crime, starring Keanu Reeves, James Caan and Vera Farmiga, 44 Inch Chest is a visceral exploration of the masculine ego at its breaking point, testing whether fear is stronger than love. --© Image Entertainment

We usually turn the maybe's to no 3-4 days out. But this movie has 7 yes and 13 maybe. Last week none of my 7 maybes made it to Ward No. 6. I'm turning the maybes to no now to let others reply yes

Meet at the front right side of the screen after the movie and we'll be going to Cambridge Brewing Co. afterwards for our discussion.
item.name: 44 inch Chest!!
